content: The Graceful Orchid is one of the Epic Soaks for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. The Soak's ability is basic when compared to some of the Epic Soaks in the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Graceful_Orchid.md', within the main section titled 'Graceful Orchid'.
The content is as follows:
The Graceful Orchid is one of the Epic Soaks for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. The Soak's ability is basic when compared to some of the Epic Soaks in the game.
